Desc.entry: A Christian organisation, open to all which aims to enhance the quality of life for vulnerable and socially excluded people. Provides facilities for adults who are disadvantaged because of homelessness, mental health issues, learning difficulties, poverty, isolation and drug or alcohol treated problems. Staff provide support, informal counselling and help to access other services to promote independent living. Offers recreational facilities and practical help, including a clothing store, hot meals, caf√©, showers, shaves, hairdressing and laundry. Has a personal development programme which offers a range of structured activities in arts, crafts, drama, sewing, cooking, literacy, numeracy, health walks, photography, relaxation, a women's group, computing and an allotment. Also has a workshop where clients can learn life skills. Qualifications may be offered in selected areas. A registered charity.
